content: 3dc into same space **1ch *3dc in 1ch space 1ch * repeat from * to * up to corner space 3dc 2ch 3dc into corner space ** repeat from ** to ** twice more 1ch repeat from * to * up to starting space 2dc into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch cut yarn work 8 more rounds using the instructions for round 4 in the following colours round 5 sherbert round 6 lime round 7 aster round 8 cream round 9 cypress green round 10 soft pink round 11 mustard round 12 fondant do not cut yarn round 13 slip_stitch to corner space and follow instructions for round 4 a sandra repeat from * to * to start of the round slip_stitch into the 3rd chain of starting 4ch round 15 4ch 3dc in same space **1ch skip 1 1sc in next st *1ch skip 3 2dc 2ch 2dc in next space 1ch skip 3 1sc in next st* repeat from * to * up to corner space 1ch skip 1 3dc 2ch 3dc in corner space ** repeat from ** to ** to the start of the round 1ch skip 1 2dc in starting space slip_stitch into the 3rd chain of staring 4ch round 16 slip_stitch to corner space 1ch ** 1sc 2ch 1sc in corner space 3ch skip 3dc 1sc in next space 2ch skip single_crochet 1sc in next space *2ch skip 2dc 1sc 2ch 1sc in next space 2ch skip 2dc 1sc in next space 2ch skip single_crochet 1sc in next space * repeat from * to * up to corner space 3ch skip 3dc ** repeat from ** to ** to the start of the round slip_stitch into top of the 1st single_crochet of the round the next final round adds the small circles to the border using a join as you go technique by making a jss one stitch on the circle join each circle one by one in a random colour order when instructed below ✽ if you do not wish to add the dingly dangly circles to your edging replace the instructions 1ch jss 1ch shown below in bold with 3ch round 16 slip_stitch to corner space ** 1sc 1ch jss 1ch 1sc in corner space 4ch skip 1sc 3ch 1sc 1sc 3ch 1sc in next space *3ch skip 1sc 2ch 1sc 1sc 1ch jss 1ch 1sc in next space 3ch skip 1sc 2ch 1sc 1sc 3ch 1sc in next space * repeat from * to * up to corner space 4ch skip 1sc 3ch 1sc ** repeat from
